headline.main: NAZI STEPS HINTED TO HOLD BULGARIA; Reports Indicate Sofia Crisis Linked to German Situation on Russian Front

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Aug. 1 -- Bulgarian troops in large numbers are moving into frontier fortifications beyond Svilengrad and Ljoubimec near the Bulgar-Turkish border, it was reported by reliable foreign diplomatic sources here today.
abstract: Germany increases troops in effort to hold Bulgaria
